describe: Please describe what you need in the description and hit GENERATE button to get results
targetInstituteEx: eg:for cover letters and personal statements
contentCreationPrompt: Please write a {{typeOfcontent}} targeting {{targetAudience}} with a {{toneOfPost}} tone and a target word count of {{targetWordCount}}. The content should include the following keywords: {{keywords}}
contentCorrectionPrompt: Please correct the following content for {{typeOfCorrection}}: {{contentToCorrect}}
startUpPrompt: Please provide {{typeOfAssistance}} for the following business: {{businessInfo}}
universityPrompt: Please create a {{typeOfWriting}} using the following personal information: {{personalInformation}}. If writing a cover letter or personal statement, it should be targeted towards {{targetInstitute}}.
langTranslationPrompt: Please translate the following content from {{sourceLang}} to {{targetLang}} for {{typeofTranslation}}: The content is {{contentToTranslate}}
socialMediaPrompt: Write a {{typeOfPost}} for {{typeOfMedia}} targeting {{targetAudience}} in a {{toneOfPost}} tone.A specific Message to be included :  {{specificMessage}}
